attributes.action: include limiting world population growth as part of the climate debate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Kyoto agreement deals with the pollution from developed countries, but world population growth, coming predominantly from developing countries, can have an enormous long term impact on the environment, especially as each individual aspires to have a quality of life (and amount of environmental impact) commensurate with that in the West. Stopping world population growth impacts on all our lives. It helps to reduce the consumption of natural resources and the production of pollution.
